column4: anyone help me with gnomebaker? I installed it a min ago and I'm getting odd errors trying to burn dvd's.  CDs work fine.  error Here: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/36086/
are you using dvdram for a drive that can only write dvd-r, or using dvd-r for a drive that can only write dvd+r?
try k3b instead of gnomebaker. make sure you a re using good branded dvd-r:s, make sure the brand of disc and writer are compatible
it's not a hw issue, I'd rather try to fix it rather than load up a different package to work around it.
